TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

Docs.summary: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific .NET Framework attribute applied to its class definition.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior.
For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type attributeType) cil managed

Docs.param: The of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where is applied.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AttributeType As Type
public: property Type ^ AttributeType { Type ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A> value can only be set through the `attributeType` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] constructor.

Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

Docs.param: The to compare to the current .

Docs.returns: if the specified is equal to the current ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

Docs.summary: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.
